LanguageData.AA_GrewAerofleetEyes.label: grew aerofleet hood
LanguageData.AA_GrewAerofleetEyes.rulePack.rulesStrin: tale_noun->[PAWN_nameDef]'s face is becoming like that of a gelatinous creature
image->[PAWN_nameDef] eyes split into four and a squishy gelatinous hood forms around [PAWN_possessive] head [circumstance_group]
desc_sentence->[PAWN_nameDef] bubbles menacingly at their foe [PAWN_pronoun].
LanguageData.StartsOozingSlime.label: started oozing slime
tale_noun->sticky slime beginning to cover [PAWN_nameDef]'s body
image->[PAWN_nameFull] begins trying to wipe off the spreading slime [circumstance_group]
image->[PAWN_nameFull] begins to feel very moist [circumstance_group]
circumstance_phrase->as someone begins poking [PAWN_possessive] slimy skin
circumstance_phrase->as someone reaches for a washcloth
LanguageData.AA_GrewHelixienFace.label: grew helixien face
LanguageData.AA_GrewHelixienFace.rulePack.rulesString: tale_noun->[PAWN_nameDef]'s face becoming like that of a giant slug
image->[PAWN_nameDef] eyes begin popping out of their skull on stalks[circumstance_group]
desc_sentence->[PAWN_nameDef] oozes menacingly at their foe [PAWN_pronoun].
LanguageData.AA_GrewSlugTail.label: grew a slug tail
LanguageData.AA_GrewSlugTail.rulePack.rulesStrings.3: circumstance_phrase->as people count the spots on [PAWN_nameDef]'s new tail
LanguageData.AA_GrewSlugTail.rulePack.rulesStrings.4: circumstance_phrase->while someone pokes at [PAWN_possessive] new tail
LanguageData.AA_GrewSlugTail.rulePack.rulesStrings.5: desc_sentence->[PAWN_pronoun] is poking the slime on it.
